lines.text: Ashley, what makes you such a tease?
My son-in-law is a churchgoing man.
Do you engage in sex in public places with ALL your friends?
You will NEVER see the baby!
He's gonna hurt somebody else, isn't he?
You promised me that assistant position if I testified on your behalf!
If you think what this guy's about is sex, you're wrong. His game is power - power over women!
I'm doing what I have to do.
